data.name: Kick Bastards
data.detailed_description:
Kick Bastards is skill based parkour game where you overcome every problem with a kick. Kick bad guys, kick down doors, kick everything you can. The game is fast paced and dynamic, you'll need to dance through danger by avoiding obstacles and mastering the levels.

Race through different realms in your quest to be the fastest in the universe with multiple unique stages each with their own set of levels and mechanics,



- Amazing parkour
- Ultimate kicking simulation
- Unique gameplay that feels great to master!
- Amazing feeling of speed and power!
- Over 50 unique levels across multiple unique environments!
- Deep mechanics creating a high skill ceiling for dedicated players!



Kick Bastards offers a unique experience where you can learn to master a range of mechanics to be as fast as you possibly can! If you have any questions about the game don't hesitate to get in contact!

You will race through beautiful and varied worlds as you try to escape the devil using your epic parkour skills. ‚ö°Ô∏è

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1035G1
  • Graphics: Intel i5 dedicated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
